title: How Riots banning system is

embed.description: The Troll Hunter reveals his grand plan to Gerald. Meanwhile the President orders the nuclear bombers to return to base.

body: In terms of South Park so we can all get along

replies.body: M&G rules say no videos that don't autoplay. This is better suited to GD.
I was legit told by another mod to post it here when I had it in player behavior please have a council meeting on it first so I don't have to move it two more times

> [{quoted}](name=DankLSD,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=1aQny44O,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-08-10T21:17:43.523+0000)
>
> I was legit told by another mod to post it here when I had it in player behavior please have a council meeting on it first so I don't have to move it two more times

I'm not surprised. The mod team kind of sucks at ensuring that all members know the rules for each Board and enforce them consistently, especially M&G. Sometimes they'll flat-out decide that they don't want to enforce certain rules, even when an issue is explicitly pointed out to them in black and white.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=1aQny44O,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2019-08-10T21:52:00.558+0000)
>
> I'm not surprised. The mod team kind of sucks at ensuring that all members know the rules for each Board and enforce them consistently, especially M&G. Sometimes they'll flat-out decide that they don't want to enforce certain rules, even when an issue is explicitly pointed out to them in black and white.

Hey,

Just seeing how some vids are doing and how they’re received on M&G. I know it’s something we’ve talked about for some time.

> [{quoted}](name=Periscope,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=1aQny44O,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2019-08-11T00:56:44.295+0000)
>
> Hey,
> 
> Just seeing how some vids are doing and how they’re received on M&G. I know it’s something we’ve talked about for some time.

It would be good to edit a mention of this pilot program into M&G's rules, so that rules lawyers don't make fools of ~~ourselves~~ themselves.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=1aQny44O,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2019-08-11T02:07:22.375+0000)
>
> It would be good to edit a mention of this pilot program into M&G's rules, so that rules lawyers don't make fools of ~~ourselves~~ themselves.

Memes aren't meant to be taken seriously, but lawyers are, so I'm not sure exactly how to respond to you.
.
.
.
My lawyers (that's right, plural) have advised me not to edit this statement.
That machine is League of Legends.
